document_data.name: Tillerturn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tillerturns''' were a [[Nobility of Baldur's Gate|patriar]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] around [[1482 DR]]. They were relatives of one of the first four [[Grand Dukes]] of Baldur's Gate.
document_data.Activities: They were engaged mainly in property and rented out many of the buildings in the city.
document_data.Notable Members:
*[[Ernest Tillerturn]], a musician noblewoman from the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Milon Tillerturn]], a nobleman who attended Lord [[Enver Gortash]]'s coronation in [[1492 DR]].
